summary: Allows you to train 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 10, 15, 20, 30, or 50 times per level.
descriptionHtml:
[b]= Description =[/b]
This mod lets you choose how many times you are allowed to get training from an NPC per level.

There are ten options:
NoTraining : No training per level.
LessTraining_1 : Train only once per level.
LessTraining_2 : Train only twice per level.
LessTraining_3 : Train only three times per level.
LessTraining_4 : Train only four times per level.
MoreTraining_10 : Train ten times per level.
MoreTraining_15 : Train fifteen times per level.
MoreTraining_20 : Train twenty times per level.
MoreTraining_30 : Train thirty times per level.
MoreTraining_50 : Train fifty times per level.

[b]= Requirements =[/b]
Skyrim?

[b]= Installation =[/b]
Copy the .esp file that you want to use to your <Skyrim>/Data folder.

[b]= Uninstalling =[/b]
Delete the .esp file you installed from your data folder.

[b]= Contact =[/b]
NullCascade on the [url=http://www.bethsoft.com/bgsforums]Bethesda forums[/url] or Lordrea on the Nexus sites. Please let me know of any bugs or improvements.

[b]= Change Log =[/b]
1.0 - Initial release.
author: NullCascade
